Prologue: My body...it feels so heavy...
Epilogue: My body...it feels so heavy...

Prologue: Oh! Something has changed. I feel...complete.
Epilogue: Oh! I feel I've changed somehow. I feel...complete.

Prologue: What is this feeling?
Epilogue: What is this feeling?

Prologue: I sense great power here.
Epilogue: I sense great power here.

Prologue: Such intense power! Soon it will be a part of me!
Epilogue: Such intense power! Soon I will make it my own!

Prologue: Fortune smiles upon us today!
Epilogue: Fortune smiles upon us today!

Prologue: This feels...strange...
Epilogue: Such a strange sensation...

Prologue: Is this the power of crystals?
Epilogue: Is this the power of crystals?

Prologue: This power... My body needs time to adjust.
Epilogue: I need time to adjust to this power...

Prologue: This aether is not quite like yours.
Epilogue: This aether feels familiar, yet somehow different.

Prologue: The aether... It courses through me!
Epilogue: I can feel the aether welling inside me!

Prologue: My power...it grows!
Epilogue: My power...it grows!

Prologue: The aether is almost too much to bear!
Epilogue: I am not sure how much more aether I can hold.

Prologue: Are you certain this is safe?
Epilogue: This will not harm me?

Prologue: Soon this power will be mine to command.
Epilogue: Soon I will make this power my own.

Prologue: Again I sup on the aether of crystals.
Epilogue: Again I feast on the aether of crystals.

Prologue: I can feel the aether pouring into me.
Epilogue: I can feel the aether flowing into me.

Prologue: The aether swells inside me.
Epilogue: The aether swells inside me.

Prologue: With every grain of sand I grow stronger.
Epilogue: With every grain of sand I gain strength.

Prologue: I have come to like this sand.
Epilogue: I rather like this sand.

Prologue: Do you have more?
Epilogue: Please, may I have some more?

Prologue: Mmm... This aether sustains me.
Epilogue: Mmm... This aether sustains me.

Prologue: Soon I will achieve my full potential!
Epilogue: Soon I will achieve my full potential!

Prologue: I sense new power within me.
Epilogue: I sense new strength growing within me.

Prologue: I will repay you in kind.
Epilogue: I shall share this strength with you.

Prologue: One day I will be worthy of this power.
Epilogue: My strength is yours to command!

Prologue: I must become stronger!
Epilogue: I will become stronger!

Prologue: I still have much room to improve.
Epilogue: I still have much room to grow.

Prologue: This gift will not be wasted.
Epilogue: This gift will not be wasted.

Prologue: It surges through me!
Epilogue: It surges through me!

Prologue: Behold my newfound strength!
Epilogue: Behold my newfound strength!

Prologue: When I am strong enough, no goal will be beyond our reach.
Epilogue: When I am strong enough, no goal will be beyond our reach.

Prologue: Your enemies will tremble before our might!
Epilogue: Your enemies will tremble before our might!

Prologue: My spirit has never burned so brightly!
Epilogue: My spirit has never burned so fiercely!

Prologue: None can stand before our combined strength.
Epilogue: None can stand before our combined strength.

Prologue: I look forward to putting this power to good use.
Epilogue: I look forward to putting this power to good use.

Prologue: I must have more aether!
Epilogue: I must have more aether!

Prologue: I am full to bursting with aether.
Epilogue: I am full to bursting with aether.

Prologue: What have you got there?
Epilogue: What have you got there?

Prologue: Have you need of me?
Epilogue: Have you need of me?

Prologue: Is this a new form of training? Very well.
Epilogue: Is this a new form of training? Very well.

Prologue: What are you planning to do?
Epilogue: What are you planning to do?

Prologue: This will not hurt...will it?
Epilogue: This will not hurt...will it?

Prologue: Will you use the sand again?
Epilogue: Will you use the sand again?

Prologue: Let us begin.
Epilogue: Let us begin.

Prologue: Ah, it is time once again to partake of the sand.
Epilogue: Ah, it is time once again to partake of the sand.

Prologue: I am ready.
Epilogue: I am ready.

Prologue: You called?
Epilogue: You called?

Prologue: I have been looking forward to this.
Epilogue: I have been looking forward to this.

Prologue: More... I must have more.
Epilogue: More... I must have more.

Prologue: I wish to become stronger...for your sake.
Epilogue: I wish to become stronger...for your sake.

Prologue: Another chance to grow.
Epilogue: Another chance to grow.

Prologue: What have you got there?
Epilogue: What have you got there?

Prologue: Are we going to see that woman again?
Epilogue: Are we going to see that woman again?

Prologue: Is something the matter?
Epilogue: Is something wrong?

Prologue: Should I become swifter, or perhaps more attentive?
Epilogue: Should I become swifter, or perhaps more attentive?

Prologue: Do I appear...different?
Epilogue: Have I...changed somehow?

Prologue: When will we use the sand again?
Epilogue: When will we use the sand again?

Prologue: Does my progress please you?
Epilogue: Does my progress please you?

Prologue: I have grown much since we began.
Epilogue: I have grown much since we began.

Prologue: I feel I have changed somehow.
Epilogue: I feel I have changed somehow.

Prologue: What will we focus on next?
Epilogue: What will we focus on next?

Prologue: I hope I am to your satisfaction.
Epilogue: I hope I am to your satisfaction.

Prologue: Will we return to the woman soon? I wish to use more sand.
Epilogue: Will we return to the woman soon? I wish to use more sand.

Prologue: I feel I have developed quite well, would you not agree?
Epilogue: I feel I have developed quite well, would you not agree?

Prologue: It makes me nervous when you stare like that.
Epilogue: It makes me nervous when you stare like that.

Prologue: Untreated sand? But the woman said not to use that...
Epilogue: Untreated sand? But the woman said not to use that...
